item.description:
There is tremendous buzz these days about Copic markers â€“ but what is it about this brand of alcohol-based markers that makes them so special? At the Introduction to Copics class by Liz Ballard, Copic Certified Designer, will teach the four different Copic blending techniques (marker on paper, feathering, touching tip to tip, and palette blending) while you make five (5) unique and adorable cards using images and materials from A Muse Artstamps. All supplies will be included.

Dates: Saturday, September 19 at 2pm
Duration: 2 hours
Fee: $25

To officially register, contact Abeille at 617.232.4343.

group.name: Greater Boston Jewelry Design and DIY Crafts Meetup Group

item.name: Intro to Copic Markers - $25
